articles.content: Getting your own solo song became a right of passage for The Beatles. It started when Paul McCartney recorded Yesterday on solo guitar in 1965, which George Martin subsequently beefed up with a strin… [+2525 chars]

articles.author: Harriet Sherwood
articles.title: Waterloo Bridge masterpiece by Claude Monet expected to sell for £24m - The Guardian
articles.description: Work is part of a series painted by the artist while he stayed at Savoy hotel with views across the Thames
articles.content:
An iconic work by the impressionist master Claude Monet that has been in the same family for more than 70 years is expected to sell for at least £24m ($30m) next month.
